markdownRemark.html: Time is always running and can be experienced at different tempos. Nothing is endless. Recognize limits, be deliberate and prepare for what comes next. There’s always more that could be done and a new time will come. Set clocks to mark time and transition to what’s next.

frontmatter.description: Recognize limits, be deliberate and prepare for what comes next. There's always more that could be done and a new time will come. Set clocks to mark time and transition to what's next.
frontmatter.title: Set clocks
